"About Haunted Domain":
"In this Quest, your objective is to use Mobile Cannon ECS to fight your way to the end, defeating Polarized Variants along the way.

Polarized Variants are enemies which can only be damaged by attacks of a specific Attribute. To damage them, you must obtain an Attribute Bullet of the same color as the enemy, which changes the Attribute of the Normal Attack of Mobile Cannon ECS.

Attribute Bullets drop when you defeat specific enemies or other Polarized Variants."

"If you deal enough damage to a Polarized Variant, it will temporarily lose its resistance to other attacks, giving you a chance to use the powerful Charge Blaster attack.
